analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0xffb19d540d842244a1642c35e46ecf9919bc8fe7.sol:
	Contract RepairVillageCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0xffb19d540d842244a1642c35e46ecf9919bc8fe7.sol#201-202)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0xffb19d540d842244a1642c35e46ecf9919bc8fe7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/27/0xffb19d540d842244a1642c35e46ecf9919bc8fe7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0xffb19d540d842244a1642c35e46ecf9919bc8fe7.sol#68-70) is not in mixedCase
